Name: Red Moccus
Desc: I'll be waiting for you on the off-road section of the Outer Ring!

1.Name: Roaring Wheels
1.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFF>Active Skill</color>
Rides a motorcycle and pushes the farthest enemy towards the Agent, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.

1.Name: Drifting Technique
1.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFF>Additional Ability</color>
When there are at least 2 <color=#FFFFFF>Sons of Calydon</color> characters in your squad: <color=#FFFFFF>Active Skill</color> DMG increases by 36%. After an <color=#FFFFFF>Active Skill</color> deals DMG to an enemy, when that enemy is defeated, the skill's cooldown is reduced by 4s.

2.Name: Drifting Technique
2.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFF>Additional Ability</color>
When there are at least 2 <color=#FFFFFF>Sons of Calydon</color> characters in your squad: <color=#FFFFFF>Active Skill</color> DMG increases by 45%. After an <color=#FFFFFF>Active Skill</color> deals DMG to an enemy, when that enemy is defeated, the skill's cooldown is reduced by 5s.

3.Name: Drifting Technique
3.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFF>Additional Ability</color>
When there are at least 2 <color=#FFFFFF>Sons of Calydon</color> characters in your squad: <color=#FFFFFF>Active Skill</color> DMG increases by 54%. After an <color=#FFFFFF>Active Skill</color> deals DMG to an enemy, when that enemy is defeated, the skill's cooldown is reduced by 6s.

4.Name: Drifting Technique
4.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFF>Additional Ability</color>
When there are at least 2 <color=#FFFFFF>Sons of Calydon</color> characters in your squad: <color=#FFFFFF>Active Skill</color> DMG increases by 63%. After an <color=#FFFFFF>Active Skill</color> deals DMG to an enemy, when that enemy is defeated, the skill's cooldown is reduced by 7s.

5.Name: Drifting Technique
5.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFF>Additional Ability</color>
When there are at least 2 <color=#FFFFFF>Sons of Calydon</color> characters in your squad: <color=#FFFFFF>Active Skill</color> DMG increases by 72%. After an <color=#FFFFFF>Active Skill</color> deals DMG to an enemy, when that enemy is defeated, the skill's cooldown is reduced by 8s.

1.Name: Mad Charge
1.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFF>Bangboo Chain Attack</color>
Run enemies over with a motorcycle and detonate an explosion, dealing massive <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
